text: Bobby Ray Simmons Jr. (born November 15, 1988 in Winston-Salem, North Carolina) is an American rapper and record producer, known professionally B.o.B. In 2006, B.o.B was signed to Jim Jonsin's label Rebel Rock Entertainment. == Studio albums == B.o.B has released 3 studio albums: Year Title 2010 B.o.B Presents: The Adventures of Bobby Ray 2012 Strange Clouds 2013 Underground Luxury ==References== ==Other websites== * B.o.B's Official website Category:Rappers from North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:1988 births Category:African-American rappers Category:Living people Category:American pop rappers Category:American record producers Category:21st-century American musicians
title: B.o.B
